app.util

Class ContextMenuHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.util.ContextMenuHelper

  • public class ContextMenuHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for creating and managing context menus in this JavaFX application.

    Provides methods to create context menus for different components such as a console area (TextFlow), a list view of tables (ListView), and a code editor area (CodeArea.)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContextMenuHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void closeTabIfNotConsole(javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPane, javafx.scene.control.Tab tab)
      Closes the given tab if it is not the console tab.
      static javafx.scene.control.ContextMenu createTabContextMenu(javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPane, javafx.scene.control.Tab tab)
      Creates a context menu for a tab in a tab pane with options to close the tab or to close all tabs except the console.
      static void setupConsoleContextMenu(javafx.scene.text.TextFlow consoleTextFlow)
      Sets up a context menu for the console area, displaying the menu on right-click.
      static void setupEditorAreaContextMenu(org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea editorArea, javafx.scene.text.TextFlow consoleTextFlow)
      Sets up a context menu for the code editor area, providing various editing and formatting options through a context menu that appears on right-click.
      static void setupTabContextMenus(javafx.scene.control.TabPane resultTabPane)
      Sets up context menus for all tabs in a tab pane, providing options to close the tab or all tabs except the console.
      static void setupTablesContextMenu(javafx.scene.control.ListView<java.lang.String> tablesListView)
      Sets up a context menu for a list view of tables, displaying the menu on right-click if an item is selected.

    • Method Detail

      • createTabContextMenu

        public static javafx.scene.control.ContextMenu createTabContextMenu(javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPane,
                                                                    javafx.scene.control.Tab tab)
        Creates a context menu for a tab in a tab pane with options to close the tab or to close all tabs except the console.
        Parameters:
        tabPane - the TabPane component containing the tabs
        tab - the Tab component for which the context menu is created
        Returns:
        a ContextMenu with "Close Tab" and "Close All Tabs" menu items

      • setupConsoleContextMenu

        public static void setupConsoleContextMenu(javafx.scene.text.TextFlow consoleTextFlow)
        Sets up a context menu for the console area, displaying the menu on right-click.
        Parameters:
        consoleTextFlow - the TextFlow component representing the console area

      • setupTablesContextMenu

        public static void setupTablesContextMenu(javafx.scene.control.ListView<java.lang.String> tablesListView)
        Sets up a context menu for a list view of tables, displaying the menu on right-click if an item is selected.
        Parameters:
        tablesListView - the ListView component containing the list of tables

      • setupEditorAreaContextMenu

        public static void setupEditorAreaContextMenu(org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea editorArea,
                                              javafx.scene.text.TextFlow consoleTextFlow)
        Sets up a context menu for the code editor area, providing various editing and formatting options through a context menu that appears on right-click.
        Parameters:
        editorArea - the CodeArea component representing the code editor
        consoleTextFlow - the TextFlow component for displaying messages in the console

      • setupTabContextMenus

        public static void setupTabContextMenus(javafx.scene.control.TabPane resultTabPane)
        Sets up context menus for all tabs in a tab pane, providing options to close the tab or all tabs except the console.
        Parameters:
        resultTabPane - the TabPane component containing the tabs

      • closeTabIfNotConsole

        public static void closeTabIfNotConsole(javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPane,
                                        javafx.scene.control.Tab tab)
        Closes the given tab if it is not the console tab.
        Parameters:
        tabPane - the TabPane component containing the tabs
        tab - the Tab component to close
